column4: I've been searching Google for information on how to sync my iPod Touch within Ubuntu (sans emulation).  Most of the results I've found are very outdated and the ones that are relevant mention only music.  Is there no way to also sync your installed apps?
no, only music with the latest ubuntu 10.04
and even music syncing isn't possible out of the box, right?  I see no option in Rhythmbox to sync with my iPod (though it recognizes the device and plays the files just fine).
i believe you need to activate the ipod plugin in rhythmbox
